title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Adequate health care and health care services shall be
provided to all inmates in order to protect their physical and mental
well-being. Such care and services shall promote inmate health through the
prevention of disease and disability and the detection, treatment and
management of disease. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7651.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
